alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton; Lycoming; Northumberland; Snyder; Sullivan; Tioga; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 5:59PM EST until March 07 at 6:45PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Snyder County in central Pennsylvania... Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Union County in central Pennsylvania... Tioga County in north central Pennsylvania... Western Sullivan County in north central Pennsylvania... Eastern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 645 PM EST. * At 559 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from South Corning to Blanchard to Williamsburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... State College, Williamsport, Lock Haven, Milton, Bellefonte, Lewisburg, Montoursville, Jersey Shore, Mansfield, Mifflinburg, Wellsboro, Park Forest Village, Carroll, Woodward, Boalsburg, Winfield, Morris, Pleasant Gap, Lamar and Muncy. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Snow Shoe and Danville exits, specifically from mile markers 155 to 216. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 99 from mile markers 71 to 85. Interstate 180 from mile markers 1 to 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Centre; Clinton; Lycoming; Northumberland; Snyder; Sullivan; Tioga; Union
